If straight away top up S$8k to SA  the funds will be marked as reserved and not available for SA shielding. As such  top up S$8k to MA is more optimal?
So the moment I hit FRS and BHS  however much i top up be it via RSTU or VCMA will not get any tax relief
Correct. And if you haven't hit 40k for SA  you can transfer OA to SA if you have any amount exceed 20k in OA for higher interest rates. Magic number for SA is 40k.
